info.author: Andrey Lebedev
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Ked Password Manager helps to manage large amounts of
passwords and related information and simplifies tasks of searching and
entering password data.

Ked-PM written as extensible framework, which allows to plug in custom password
database back-ends and custom user interface front-ends. Currently only Figaro
PM back-end. To control KedPM user can choose between  CLI and GTK2 based GUI
front-ends.
info.name: kedpm
info.html_description:
Ked Password Manager helps to manage large amounts of passwords and related information and simplifies tasks of searching and entering password data.

Ked-PM written as extensible framework, which allows to plug in custom password database back-ends and custom user interface front-ends. Currently only Figaro PM back-end. To control KedPM user can choose between CLI and GTK2 based GUI front-ends.
